flash.tools.debugger.threadsafe

Class ThreadSafeSourceFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.tools.debugger.threadsafe.ThreadSafeSourceFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SourceFile

    public class ThreadSafeSourceFile
extends Object
implements SourceFile
    Thread-safe wrapper for flash.tools.debugger.SourceFile
    Author:
    Mike Morearty

      • wrap

        public static ThreadSafeSourceFile wrap(Object syncObj,
                        SourceFile sourceFile)
        Wraps a SourceFile inside a ThreadSafeSourceFile. If the passed-in SourceFile is null, then this function returns null.

      • getLine

        public String getLine(int lineNum)
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        Obtains the textual content of the given line from within a source file. Line numbers start at 1 and go to getLineCount().
        Specified by:
        getLine in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        the line of source of the file. Any carriage return and/or line feed are stripped from the end of the string.

      • getLineCount

        public int getLineCount()
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        Returns the number of source lines in the given file
        Specified by:
        getLineCount in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        -1 indicates an error. Call getError() to obtain specific reason code.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        File name of this SourceFile. In the case of a disk-based SourceFile, this is the same as the filename with no path, e.g. 'myfile.as'
        Specified by:
        getName in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        filename, or "" (never null)

      • getPackageName

        public String getPackageName()
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        Get the package name portion of the path for this file. For example, if class mx.controls.Button.as was in C:\flex\sdk\frameworks\mx\controls\Button.as, then getPackageName() would return "mx\controls".
        Specified by:
        getPackageName in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        package name, or "" (never null)

      • getFullPath

        public String getFullPath()
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        Full path and file name, if its exists, for this SourceFile. For disk-based SourceFiles, this is equivalent to getBasePath + slash + getPackageName() + slash + getName() where "slash" is a platform-specific slash character.
        Specified by:
        getFullPath in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        path, never null

      • getBasePath

        public String getBasePath()
        Description copied from interface: SourceFile
        Base path for this filename, without the package-name portion. For example, if class mx.controls.Button.as was in C:\flex\sdk\frameworks\mx\controls\Button.as, then getBasePath() would return "C:\flex\sdk\frameworks" (note that the "mx\controls" part would NOT be returned).
        Specified by:
        getBasePath in interface SourceFile
        Returns:
        base path, or null
